title: ReNew seeks funding for solar gear business
description: ReNew Energy Global Plc is considering various funding options for its solar gear manufacturing business, including bringing in investors. The company aims to list the business within the next two years to leverage investor interest in new energy companies in India. Proceeds will be used to develop new projects and reduce debt.
